titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Division of Biological Sciences (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Division of Biological Sciences (University of Michigan) records

archdesc.bioghist: University committee established to coordinate biological research and also to establish cooperative investigations among allied departments and units.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes, reports, grant applications and proposals, and related correspondence.
